item.description:
Opening it up for anyone else who is interested.

http://www.stpats5k.com/

Rather than taking a team approach, I encourage anyone who is interested to register as an individual member. 

On the day of the race, let's try to meet up roughly an hour or two ahead of time.  I'll designate a place in the future as the event gets closer in time.

The Details ...

The St. Pat's 5K will start and finish on Smith Street at the Rhode Island statehouse. The 5K will start at 11:15 a.m.


Please plan on arriving early to park and pick up your race packet.
If possible, please try to pick up your race packet before race day.

T-Shirt to all Entrants. But the first 3,000 to register will receive a long sleeve technical shirt.

Parade at noon!  Likely to be some post-race party festivities.

Race Number and T-shirt Pick-Up ...

Friday March 9, 10:00 a.m. to 4:00 p.m.
Location: Patrick's Pub. 381 Smith Street
Providence, RI 02908

Saturday, Race Day, March 10, 9:00 a.m. to 10:45 a.m.
Location: Parking lot across from the Rhode Island state House on Smith Street

Registration ...

Registration Details (for individual 5K's):

$26 till 12/31/2011 
$27 1/1/2012 to 1/31/2012 
$28 2/1/2012 to 2/26/2012

Registration Details (for all three 5K's in the Tour de Patrick):

$75 till 12/31/2011
$80 from 1/1/2012 to 1/31/2012
$85 from 2/1/2012 to 2/26/2012

Online registration is available.  The registration will ask you for your "projected" time of finishing the 5K.  I run roughly a 28 minute 5K, for example.

Any questions, comments and/or concerns, please don't hesitate to ask.  Should be a fun day of running, hopefully the weather will cooperate.  If you have anything to add, please don't hesitate to comment.

Tour de Patrick ...

3 Great 5K Races 3 great Parades 3 great Cities

Irish 5K, Saturday, March 3, 2012 Pawtucket, RI
St. Pat's 5K, Saturday, March 10, 2012 Providence, RI
Celtic 5K, Sunday, March 11, 2012 Worcester, MA

Enter any one of these fun races or enter all three and complete the "Tour de Patrick"

Bonus offer: All participants that register for all three races before the first race on March 3, 2012 will receive a one of a kind "Tour de Patrick" hat.
item.name: Tour de Patrick (Part II): St. Pat's 5K
